participant_1.background:
I do not wish to discuss my parents' death.
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
my favorite band is one direction.
i like the taste of cheese.

participant_2.background:
Leaving my hometown to pursue my dreams.
I was sad when my cat died last year.
my father was a driver himself.
I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts.
i volunteer at the local humane society.

content.text: Good morning! How are you doing today?
Good morning! I'm doing well, thank you for asking!  How are you today?
I'm doing good as well.  I love One Direction!
Me too! They're my favorite band!  I saw them in concert last year and it was amazing.
That's awesome!  I'm so jealous!  I've always wanted to see them in concert.
They're amazing live!  You should definitely try to see them if you can.
I will do!  Thank you for the recommendation!
No problem!  Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.  They're my best friends.
That's awesome!  I love animals.  I volunteer at the local humane society.
That's really cool!  I'm sure the animals love you there.
They do!  It's a lot of fun.  What do you do for fun?
I like to read, listen to music, and spend time with my pets.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I like to do those things too.  I also like to go to the movies and watch TV.
Me too!  I love going to the movies.  What's your favorite movie of all time?
That's a tough question!  I have a lot of favorite movies, but I think my favorite is The Princess Bride.
That's a great movie!  I love it too.  What's your favorite part?
The scene where the giant is eating the horse!  That's so funny!
That is a funny scene!  I love that movie.
Me too!  It's one of my favorites.  Well, I have to go now.  It was nice talking to you!
You too!  Have a good day!
You too!
